sentence.content: Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher said Monday the Irish Republican Army members who blew up the Royal Marines School of Music and killed 10 bandsmen last week are ``monsters&apost;&apost; who will be found and punished.

sentence.content: ``The young men whom we lost were murdered by common murderers who must be found and brought to justice and put behind bars for a very long time,&apost;&apost; she said following a tour of the school&apost;s wrecked barracks in Deal, southeast England.
